member.name: T:System.Web.HttpUtility

summary.vsli:raw: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: 提供用于在处理 Web 请求时编码和解码 URL 的方法。 此类不能被继承。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.#ctor

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpUtility" /> class.

member.summary: 初始化 类的新实例。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlAttributeEncode(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Minimally converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.

member.summary: 将字符串最小限度地转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlAttributeEncode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)

summary.vsli:raw: Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string and sends the encoded string to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream.

member.summary: 将字符串最小限度地转换为 HTML 编码的字符串，并将编码的字符串发送到 输出流。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

member.summary: 将已经为 HTTP 传输进行过 HTML 编码的字符串转换为已解码的字符串。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded into a decoded string, and sends the decoded string to a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> output stream.

member.summary: 将已经过 HTML 编码的字符串转换为已解码的字符串并将其发送给 输出流。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.Object)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts an object's string representation into an HTML-encoded string, and returns the encoded string.

member.summary: 将对象的字符串表示形式转换为 HTML 编码的字符串，并返回已编码的字符串。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.

member.summary: 将字符串转换为 HTML 编码字符串。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a string into an HTML-encoded string, and returns the output as a <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> stream of output.

member.summary: 将字符串转换为 HTML 编码的字符串并将输出作为 输出流返回。

summary.vsli:raw: Encodes a string.

member.summary: 对字符串进行编码。

member.summary: 对字符串进行编码。

param.name: addDoubleQuotes
param.vsli:raw: A value that indicates whether double quotation marks will be included around the encoded string.

summary.vsli:raw: Parses a query string into a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> using <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.UTF8" /> encoding.

member.summary: 使用 编码将查询字符串分析成一个 。

returns.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> of query parameters and values.

summary.vsli:raw: Parses a query string into a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" />.

member.summary: 使用指定的 将查询字符串分析成一个 。

<paramref name="encoding" /> is <see langword="null" />.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a URL-encoded byte array into a decoded string using the specified encoding object, starting at the specified position in the array, and continuing for the specified number of bytes.

member.summary: 使用指定的编码对象，从数组中的指定位置开始到指定的字节数为止，将 URL 编码的字节数组转换为已解码的字符串。

param.name: bytes
param.vsli:raw: The array of bytes to decode.

param.name: offset
param.vsli:raw: The position in the byte to begin decoding.

member.param: 字节中开始解码的位置。

param.name: count
param.vsli:raw: The number of bytes to decode.

param.name: e
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> object that specifies the decoding scheme.

member.param: 指定解码方法的 对象。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="bytes" /> is <see langword="null" />, but <paramref name="count" /> does not equal <see langword="0" />.

<paramref name="offset" /> is less than <see langword="0" /> or greater than the length of the <paramref name="bytes" /> array.
-or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than <see langword="0" />, or <paramref name="count" /> + <paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of the <paramref name="bytes" /> array.

member.exception: 小于 或大于 数组的长度。 或 小于 ，或 + 大于 数组的长度。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode(System.Byte[],System.Text.Encoding)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a URL-encoded byte array into a decoded string using the specified decoding object.

member.summary: 使用指定的解码对象将 URL 编码的字节数组转换为已解码的字符串。

param.name: bytes
param.vsli:raw: The array of bytes to decode.

param.name: e
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that specifies the decoding scheme.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a string that has been encoded for transmission in a URL into a decoded string.

member.summary: 将已经为在 URL 中传输而编码的字符串转换为解码的字符串。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a URL-encoded string into a decoded string, using the specified encoding object.

param.name: e
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that specifies the decoding scheme.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecodeToBytes(System.Byte[])

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a URL-encoded array of bytes into a decoded array of bytes.

member.summary: 将 URL 编码的字节数组转换为已解码的字节数组。

param.name: bytes
param.vsli:raw: The array of bytes to decode.

member.returns: 一个已解码的字节数组。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecodeToBytes(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a URL-encoded array of bytes into a decoded array of bytes, starting at the specified position in the array and continuing for the specified number of bytes.

member.summary: 从数组中的指定位置开始一直到指定的字节数为止，将 URL 编码的字节数组转换为已解码的字节数组。

param.name: bytes
param.vsli:raw: The array of bytes to decode.

param.name: offset
param.vsli:raw: The position in the byte array at which to begin decoding.

member.param: 字节数组中开始解码的位置。

param.name: count
param.vsli:raw: The number of bytes to decode.

member.returns: 一个已解码的字节数组。

exception.vsli:raw: <paramref name="bytes" /> is <see langword="null" />, but <paramref name="count" /> does not equal <see langword="0" />.

<paramref name="offset" /> is less than <see langword="0" /> or greater than the length of the <paramref name="bytes" /> array.
-or-
<paramref name="count" /> is less than <see langword="0" />, or <paramref name="count" /> + <paramref name="offset" /> is greater than the length of the <paramref name="bytes" /> array.

member.exception:
小于 或大于 数组的长度。
或 - 小于 ，或 + 大于 数组的长度。

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecodeToBytes(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Converts a URL-encoded string into a decoded array of bytes.

member.summary: 将 URL 编码的字符串转换为已解码的字节数组。
member.returns: 一个已解码的字节数组。
